channel.title: About my 'Americans...' topic
channel.description:
Too all and fore that I may of offended in that topic I am sorry. I had had a shit of a day and needed to vent my anger out, it shouldn't of been bashing the shit out of a good nation, however. I have always believe the better man is the one to bring the argument to the end of the stick, and whilst I am not that man I may attempt to be. I am sorry, and I actually mean that.
9/11 was not a good thing, though there are a few things that make me question it etc.
